articles.title: Aaron Carter refused rehabilitation plan from his team before accidental death - Fox News
articles.description: Aaron Carter's team revealed that they had attempted to get the former pop star the help he needed while he suffered from addiction ahead of his death, but he blew off the plan.
articles.content:
Despite Aaron Carter having a strong support system amid his battle with addiction, members of his team said it was a "challenge" getting him the help he deserved.
